name: Cyberscape Joyride
description: This is an interactive short story set in the Cyberpunk genre. It was written with a two fold purpose. First, to practice programming skills in the Ink programming language. Second, for entry in the InkJam 2018. In its current form, it is more of a test of concepts such as dynamic text replacement and variable management. In the future, I plan on expanding the game to have a random combat manager and increase in game size. It is very playable and has a simple scoring system and a few puzzles, reminiscent of traditional interactive fiction. I hope you enjoy my first foray into IF.
